rooms.description: Vastu-compliant entrance hall ensuring positive energy flow. Facing the south to invite auspicious energies.
Spacious living area with natural lighting from east-facing windows.
Modern kitchen placed in the southeast corner for auspicious energy.
Master bedroom with a private balcony facing north-west to enhance relaxation and calm.
Well-lit bathroom adjacent to master bedroom for ease of access.

openings.description: Main entrance door on the south side ensuring auspicious entry as per Vastu principles.
East facing window providing natural morning light and positive energy.

rooms.description: Guest bedroom placed in the north-east corner for balance and calm.
Study room with west facing window enhancing focus, placed in the north-west area.

openings.description: North-facing window ensuring light and energy circulation.
Access point to the expansive rooftop terrace for relaxation and gatherings.
Two-car garage with west-facing entrance ensuring easy access and Vastu compliance.
Swimming pool area located in the southwest with secure access and privacy.

features.description: A modern swimming pool integrated into the design for relaxation and fitness.
Expansive rooftop terrace offering panoramic views and space for gatherings.
Spacious two-car garage integrated into the design with secure access.

notes: Design incorporates Vastu principles with proper directional alignments to promote positive energy and balance. The layout ensures ample natural lighting, efficient circulation spaces, and privacy in key areas like the master bedroom and study room. The colonial aesthetic is maintained through design elements while blending farmhouse comforts.
